alert.note: Alert for Allen; Barren; Logan; Simpson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 03 at 9:19AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST/1 PM EST/ TODAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kentucky, north central Kentucky, northwest Kentucky and south central Kentucky, including the following counties, in east central Kentucky, Anderson, Bourbon, Fayette, Franklin, Harrison, Jessamine, Mercer, Nicholas, Scott and Woodford. In north central Kentucky, Breckinridge, Bullitt, Hardin, Henry, Jefferson, Larue, Meade, Nelson, Oldham, Shelby, Spencer and Washington. In northwest Kentucky, Hancock and Ohio. In south central Kentucky, Allen, Barren, Butler, Edmonson, Grayson, Green, Hart, Logan, Marion, Simpson, Taylor and Warren. * WHEN...Until Noon CST/1 PM EST/ today. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
